welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Giussano, a charming town known for its rich history and scenic beauty. Get ready to immerse yourself in the local culture and indulge in delicious Italian cuisine. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Giussano has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lugano Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
